item.title: Crypto Lawyer Unveils His Price Expectations for XRP
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
It has been weeks since Judge Analisa Torres gave the ruling that XRP as a digital currency is not in itself a security. The verdict which was one of the most anticipated in the broader Web3.0 ecosystem stirred a remarkable jump in the price of the digital currency. Price Expectations for XRP Unlike most people’s

item.title: LUNC News: Proposal To Re-Enable Terra Luna Classic IBC To Cosmos Chain Passed
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
LUNC News: The community has unanimously voted in favor of a proposal to re-enable inter-blockchain communication (IBC) transfers between Crescent and Terra Luna Classic. Professor Edward Kim earlier announced the reopening IBCs for Osmosis, Crescent, and Juno that were disabled during the May 2022 Terra-LUNA crisis. Proposal To Re-Enable IBC Between Crescent and Terra Luna

The post LUNC News: Proposal To Re-Enable Terra Luna Classic IBC To Cosmos Chain Passed appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: XRP Price Heading to $0.6; Is this Dip Worth Buying?
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
On July 13th, the Ripple coin price experienced an impressive surge of 73% due to a partial victory in the SEC lawsuit, reaching a peak of $0.82. However, after this partial triumph, XRP struggled to keep up the upward momentum, resulting in a double top formation at the $0.82 level and a neckline at $0.70.

The post XRP Price Heading to $0.6; Is this Dip Worth Buying? appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
On July 13th, the Ripple coin price experienced an impressive surge of 73% due to a partial victory in the SEC lawsuit, reaching a peak of $0.82. However, after this partial triumph, XRP struggled to keep up the upward momentum, resulting in a double top formation at the $0.82 level and a neckline at $0.70.

The post XRP Price Heading to $0.6; Is this Dip Worth Buying? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: DeFi Crash Avoided: CRV Price Soars 10% As Curve Founder Pays Debt And Hacker Returns Funds
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Curve Finance founder Michael Egorov sells 8 million CRV to 5 investors again through over-the-counter (OTC) to pay off his $80 million debt. Meanwhile, Curve Finance pools hackers agreed and started to return funds in exchange for a 10% bounty announced by Curve and other DeFi protocols to prevent a major collapse of DeFi. Curve

The post DeFi Crash Avoided: CRV Price Soars 10% As Curve Founder Pays Debt And Hacker Returns Funds appeared first on CoinGape.

item.description:

item.title: Shiba Inu Ecosystem Token LEASH Scores New Listing
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Instant custody-free cryptocurrency exchange StealthEX has listed Doge Killer popularly known by its ticker LEASH, on its mobile trading app.  The exchange confirmed in a tweet that members of the SHIB Army can now access LEASH on StealthEX Mobile App. Markedly, LEASH is a unique token reserved for loyal supporters of the Shiba Inu ecosystem.

The post Shiba Inu Ecosystem Token LEASH Scores New Listing appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Elon Musk Calls For Cancelling New York Times Over ‘Genocide Support’
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Tesla CEO and billionaire Elon Musk called for boycotting The New York Times over an article he alleges to be supporting genocide of white people in South Africa. Controversy erupted over the “Kill the Boer!” chant raised by Julius Malema, a South African leader during a recent rally in Johannesburg. In response, Musk had on
